snippet.title: Dead Rising 3 - E3 2013 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the full uninterrupted gameplay trailer for Dead Rising 3, releasing exclusively on the Xbox One.

Follow Dead Rising 3 at GameSpot.com!
http://www.gamespot.com/dead-rising-3/
